I've started this on my [25-issue-comments-v3 fork][1]


[1]: https://github.com/ctshryock/octokit/tree/25-issue-comments-v3

I've got the listing and added a comment done on my fork.
Listing all comments on an issue doesn't (yet) return a unique identifier, unless you count the url.  This makes updating an existing comment ... a pain.

I tried to put in an issue @ support.github.com, but I can't seem to login and Tender didn't like me trying to post an issue with an email they already had, even though they wouldn't let me login.  I'll follow up tomorrow
